analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: 23.36. Atītārammaṇattika, Kusalattika🔽Naatītārammaṇaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā atītārammaṇo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
analyzed: na atīta ārammaṇam na kusalam dhammam paccayā atīta ārammaṇaḥ kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekavīsa pe avigate ekavīsa
translated: The Atītārammaṇattika, Kusalattika🔽With a past object and not wholesome as condition … (as in the Atītārammaṇattika, Kusalattika, §§1–10, with the words “with a past object” substituted for “wholesome” and the words “with a future object” for “unwholesome”.)

original: Naatītārammaṇaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā atītārammaṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
analyzed: na atīta ārammaṇam na akusalam dhammam paccayā atīta ārammaṇaḥ akusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekavīsa pe avigate ekavīsa
translated: With a future object and not wholesome as condition … (as in the Atītārammaṇattika, Kusalattika, §§1–10, with the words “with a future object” substituted for “wholesome” and the words “with a past object” for “unwholesome”.)
